Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Main class: Users actions are managed by Game class.

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Add a player in the game, if game has less then 4 players.
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the player's nickname in the game
      Returns:
      true if has correctly added a player in the game

    • startSinglePlayer

      public boolean startSinglePlayer()
      Starts the single player mode, only if there is 1 player in game.
      Returns:
      true if game correctly starts in single player mode.

    • startMultiplayer

      public boolean startMultiplayer()
      Starts the multiplayer mode, only if there at least 2 players in the game(maximum 4 players).
      Returns:
      true if the game correctly starts in multiplayer mode.

    • endTurn

      public boolean endTurn()
      Makes turn ends for the current player and starts the turn for the next player.
      Returns:
      true if the player can end the turn.

    • distributionResourceSecondThird

      public boolean distributionResourceSecondThird​(ResourceType resourceType)
      Does the initial distribution of one resource for the second and third players.
      Parameters:
      resourceType - is the resource type chosen by the player.
      Returns:
      true if it is called on the second or third player.

    • distributionResourceFourthPlayer

      public boolean distributionResourceFourthPlayer​(ResourceType resourceType1, ResourceType resourceType2)
      Does the initial distribution of two resources for the fourth player.
      Parameters:
      resourceType1 - is the first resource type chosen by the player.
      resourceType2 - is the second resource type chosen by the player.
      Returns:
      true if it is called on the fourth player.

    • endGame

      public boolean endGame()
      Founds the winner player on base of victory points of all players and sets the winner player.
      Returns:
      true when has found the winner player.

    • switchLevels

      public boolean switchLevels​(int maxSlotsFirst, int maxSlotsSecond)
      Allows the player to switch resources through warehouse's levels, if it is permitted by the rules.
      Parameters:
      maxSlotsFirst - represents the first level to switch with the second.
      maxSlotsSecond - represents the second level to switch with the first.
      Returns:
      true if the level switch is legal.

    • buyDevelopmentCard

      public boolean buyDevelopmentCard​(int level, Colour colour, int slot, int payUsingExtraDep1, int payUsingExtraDep2)
      Allows the player to buy a development card from the deckgrid and insert that card into one of his personal board's slots.
      Parameters:
      level - is the level of the card wanted by the player.
      colour - is the colour of the card wanted by the player.
      slot - is the personal board's slot where te player wants to insert the card
      Returns:
      true if the player can buy that card and if the player can insert that card into the chosen slot

    • activateProduction

      public boolean activateProduction​(boolean[] whichDevCardSlot, boolean fromPersonalBoard, boolean[] whichLeaderCard, ResourceType resourceType1, ResourceType resourceType2, ResourceType obtainedResource, ResourceType[] resourceObtainedFromLeader, int payUsingExtraDep1, int payUsingExtraDep2)
      Allows the player to activate production from development cards, base production power, leader cards. The player can choose all the possible productions or only some of those.
      Parameters:
      whichDevCardSlot - says from which development cards the player wants to activate the production.
      fromPersonalBoard - says if the player wants to activate production from personal board.
      whichLeaderCard - says from which leader cards the player wants to activate the production.
      resourceType1 - is the first resource type of resource the player wants to pay to activate the base production power. It is null if the player doesn't want to use the base production power.
      resourceType2 - is the second resource type of resource the player wants to pay to activate the base production power. * It is null if the player doesn't want to use the base production power.
      obtainedResource - is the resource type of resource received by base production power. It is null if the player doesn't want to use the base production power.
      resourceObtainedFromLeader - is the resource type of resources received by leader card's production power. * It is null if the player doesn't want to use any leader card's production power or if the player hasn't got any leader card with a production ability
      Returns:
      true if the productions can be done.

    • takeResourcesFromMarket

      public boolean takeResourcesFromMarket​(int row, int column)
      Allows the player to select a row or a column in the resource market to take the resources contained in that row or column.
      Parameters:
      row - index of selection for row.
      column - index of selection for column.
      Returns:
      true if player selects a correct row or column.

    • insertResourcesIntoWarehouse

      public boolean insertResourcesIntoWarehouse​(ResourceType resourceType, int quantityToAdd, boolean intoExtraDeposit)
      Allows the player to insert into his warehouse the resources he wants to insert, once he toke those resources from market.
      Parameters:
      resourceType - is the resource type of resource that the player wants to insert
      quantityToAdd - is the quantity of resource that the player wants to insert.
      Returns:
      true if the player can effectively insert than number of that type of resource.

    • firstAudience

      public boolean firstAudience()
      When a Faith Marker reaches (or goes beyond) a Pope space, a Vatican Report occurs. All the players in that Pope space earn 2 victory points.
      Returns:
      false and it does nothing if firsAudience() method was already called.

    • secondAudience

      public boolean secondAudience()
      When a Faith Marker reaches (or goes beyond) a Pope space, a Vatican Report occurs. All the players in that Pope space earn 3 victory points.
      Returns:
      false and it does nothing if secondAudience() method was already called.

    • thirdAudience

      public boolean thirdAudience()
      When a Faith Marker reaches (or goes beyond) a Pope space, a Vatican Report occurs. All the players in that Pope space earn 3 victory points.
      Returns:
      false and it does nothing if thirdAudience() method was already called.

      Returns:
      true if it can be done.

    • chooseLeaderCards

      public boolean chooseLeaderCards​(int pos1, int pos2)
      Makes the player choose 2 leader cards from the 4 leader cards he got when game starts.
      Parameters:
      pos1 - Position of the first leader card.
      pos2 - Position of the second leader card.
      Returns:
      false if the current player has already chosen the two leader cards

      public boolean activateLeaderCard​(int pos)
      Allows the player to activate the leader card's special ability.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the leaderCard to activate.
      Returns:
      false if the player has already done his move in this turn.
